comments.comment: My dear brothers and sisters of Sri Lanka. Sinhalese, Tamil, Muslim, Malay and Burgher, we are all children of mother Sri Lanka.. Let's come together and make the right decision for all communities and ethnic groups of our motherland. Mr Sajith Premadasa is the only candidate who supports human rights, stands firmly against racism, discrimination and supports equal treatment to all majority & minority groups, which includes Sinhalese, Tamils, Muslims, Burghers and Malays.. All of us born in Sri Lanka deserve to have equal rights and do not wish to be victims of racism.. Let's come together and support Mr Sajith Premadasa to be our new President.. God bless you all...and wish all the blessings and success to Mr Sajith Premadasa.. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
comments.author: coolasice54321

comments.comment:
Get ready to go to hell portuguse man talking sinhalese . Victor ivan leftist who turned into u.n.p Sajith s father too said he was duppathage hithwatha . Poor mans freind Slogan people thought since he was from keselwaththa slum and wife was working in dematagoda grocery both poor they will make " nathi bari athi haki " poor into rich as promised . Instead premadsa killed 67 , ooo sinhalese boys sons of poor and middle class patents children. Jornalists editors photographers his own ministers army.  Navy commanders political oponents.  Busioness men professionals various people killed mostly sinhalese . Ranil too killed keleniya youths batalanda murderer he was named and gonawala sunil a murderer and rapisthis he Made his body guard and r.premadsa was pioneer who made youths kidnapped by white vans pick up vehicles.   With no number plates Lorrys and helocopters . And kill and burn bodys on tyre piles or thrw to sea  sajith is going to start premadsa era again with ranil fathers assistant murderer . Victor ivan is not sinhalese butsired  portuguse  trouble maker from start ignorant people dont know r.premadsas children sajith. Doolanjalie his sisters familys and mother hema premadsa have been converted to christinity fumdermentalist faith insulting buddha dhamma. Gothabaya rajapakse is sinhalese buddhist from ruhuna place where anagarika dhatrmapala wad born  king dutugamunu fought and killed king elara . And he killed prabhakaran like that and saved sinhala race. He has no anerican citizenship now just because he lived for ten years in america he is not america. Domt be idiots . He was born to political family buddhist and went to ananda college and srrved army for 30'years retired and went to america because chandrika did not give him proper place when brother became president he returned and won war 9 Only foolish thing he did was to call his freind sarath fonseka who migrated with him to anmetica   And asked brother mahinda to offer comander post . And fonseka bit the hand that fed him today he is enemy and vow to hang rajapakses together with yellow robes bearer dabara amila . If sajith wins funerals of sinhalese  this old man is digging fast road to hell after taking bribes from u.m
N.p
